title: The New Boy
description: When Rafael Perez arrives in a new city the young shape-shifter has no idea what's about to be in store for him. A vicious roommate, a house full of horny men and a leader that knows it's his right to take Rafael's virginity from him.Things get more difficult as he learns the most important rule in a bachelor herd of horse shifters: if you're not the lead stallion you'd better learn to submit fast!
author: Arielle Pierce
